title: Discover
text: This is the first stage where we begin to gather information about the project. By understanding our client's business and industry, competitors, target audience, values, and advantages, we define a baseline for our further project direction. We love asking questions to get a deeper understanding of the client's ideas, requirements and goals.

title: Show & Tell
text: After understanding all the aspects of the project, we create an outline for the project with milestones and a timeline. We start sketching and wireframing the user experience and user interface. In this phase, we present our vision for the project and talk through all its elements with the client. The main goal of this part of the process is to ensure a strategic plan that aligns with the client's vision.

title: Deliver
text: Developing a scalable and reliable web product, unique to every client, is our everyday business. In this phase, we carry out layout and programming processes using the latest platforms and trends in development. This is an iterative process between a client and our creative development team, with reviews and revisions on all aspects of a project so we ensure the quality of the product.

title: Sustain
text: Itâ€™s essential to stay relevant to the market and consumers. We work with clients beyond project launch and make sure to stay one step ahead of the competition. We provide maintenance and regular updates as well as innovate and roll-out new features over time as the circumstances change.
